message: Let's split it evenly, Bob.  Fair is fair!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, Bob. Let's compromise. I'll take a little less, but I'm not going to let you take everything!
You're getting closer, but I think I can do better!
Alright, Bob, you've made your point. I'm willing to take less, but this is my final offer.  Take it or leave it!
